Articles.Content:
Hello, I have been in a quite frustrating situation with my game. It appears as if the main menu options are grayed out and unclickable since the last update. I run the game on windows 7 with no mods and I have also Tried to run the game in windowed mode, as administrator, compatibility mode (windows Vista, windows 7) Since I read online these would fix my problem but I had no luck with them. I even ran up to another thread in this forum in which a user had the same problem as me but his fix did not work for me.

I run the **64**-bit version of the game but the problem **also** occurs on the **32**-bit version.

I run version v0.90.0.705 Beta

build id = 00705

2014-12-15\_13-42-05

Branch: master

 My output\_log.txt file is here: [https://www./?3czj97l4ao9x7ox](https://www./?3czj97l4ao9x7ox)

![TaSvhLf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TaSvhLf.jpg)

Anyone can help me with this matter? I would be thankful ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Well something is definitely wrong, you should not have this in the log:

> 
> UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path "D:\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\settings.cfg" is denied.

This suggests it may be a permissions issue, but could also be an overzealous anti-virus or some kind of security software that is preventing KSP from accessing the files it needs.

You may need to try a [**clean boot**](https://support.microsoft.com/en-gb/kb/929135) to eliminate other programs from interfering.
